title: Garten of Banban 6
description:
Explore the forgotten levels of Banban’s Kindergarten. Survive the new terrors that reside below. Uncover the truth behind the place, and find the whereabouts of your missing child LEGO The Hobbit
After the events of Garten of Banban 4, you are forced to run away and delve even deeper into the mysterious establishment that is Banban’s kindergarten . You are heading down to where no human dares to be.
You have run out of friends to make. From now on, you only meet new enemies who will make sure you never feel alone! In Banban’s Kindergarten, there are enemies to be made in every corner

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core 2 DUO 2.4 GHz / AMD Athlon X2 2.7 GHz
system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 Ti or AMD HD 7850
